title: A Day Without Angela Yee
itunes:title: A Day Without Angela Yee
description:
Wednesday 3/8- While Angela took the day off from the show to support the movement "Without Women Day", Charlamagne and Dj Envy held down the show, which they quickly realized how different it was without her being there. Moreover, the phone lines were opened to discuss Ciara's pregnancy pictures, that has social media going crazy and instead of "Ask Yee" it was "Ask C & E". Also, in support of the movement Charlamagne gave Donkey of the Day to people that didn't understand or criticized the movement "Without Women Day".

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Wednesday 3/8- While Angela took the day off from the show to support the movement "Without Women Day", Charlamagne and Dj Envy held down the show, which they quickly realized how different it was without her being there. Moreover, the phone lines were opened to discuss Ciara's pregnancy pictures, that has social media going crazy and instead of "Ask Yee" it was "Ask C & E". Also, in support of the movement Charlamagne gave Donkey of the Day to people that didn't understand or criticized the movement "Without Women Day".
